downloadTitle: System Center 2022 Integration Pack for Exchange Admin
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for Exchange Admin is an add-on for System Center 2022 Orchestrator that enables you to facilitate the automation of Exchange administration tasks, such as mailbox management, for on-premise, remote or cloud based environments in Microsoft Exchange and Office 365.
detailsSection:
Release History
  • 06/30/2022 - Original English release, version 10.22.0.1
  • 05/25/2023 - version 10.22.2.5, Blog
  • 08/09/2023 - version 10.22.2.6, Successfully retrieve information through Remote PowerShell from the server that's running Exchange Server
systemRequirementsSection:
• System Center 2022 - Orchestrator
  • Windows Server 2019 or higher
  • Microsoft Exchange 2010 Service Pack 2 or Microsoft Exchange 2012 or Microsoft Exchange Online/Microsoft 365
  • Microsoft Exchange Management Shell
  • Exchange Online PowerShell V3 module (EXO V3), you must upgrade from EXO V2 to EXO V3 for this IP
  • Microsoft PowerShell 2.0
  • Microsoft WinRM 2.0
  • .NET Framework 4.0 or higher (.NET 4.7.2 recommended)
  • RAM – minimum 1GB (recommended 2GB)
  • Disk space minimum 200MB
  • CPU Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: Download the .oip file, register the Integration Pack in Deployment Manager and then deploy the Integration Pack on Runbook Designer and Runbook Server.
